metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010317 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: WavPack 5.1.0 and earlier is affected by: CWE-457: Use of UninitializedVariable. The impact is: Unexpected control flow, crashes, and segfaults.The component is: ParseCaffHeaderConfig (caff.c:486). The attack vector is:Maliciously crafted .wav file. The fixed version is: After commithttps://github.com/dbry/WavPack/commit/f68a9555b548306c5b1ee45199ccdc4a16a6101b.

criterions.comment: wavpack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
